title: Child's Cap, 1751–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, sequins, foil
Technique: embroidery, bobbin lace, taffeta lining
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Christening cap in white with gold embroidery, sequins and foil in a floral pattern. Metallic bobbin lace along the edges and sides. Trimming of ribbons, gauze ties and pink lining.

tombstone.epitaph:
Child's Cap, 1751–1800.
1751–1800. Medium: silk, metallic thread, sequins, foil
Technique: embroidery, bobbin lace, taffeta lining. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-53-10.
